XPSPLLibrary¶

Library

Loads and tracks XPSPL modules.

Methods¶

load¶

load($name[, $dir = false])

Loads a XPSPL module.

Parameters:
  • $name (string) – Module name.
  • $dir (string|null) – Location of the module.
Return type:

boolean
